speaker: Promoter
lines: Ledger thick as a brick; smile thin as a blade.
He oils the bell rope between thumb and forefinger.
'We make stories here,' he says. 'The trick is making them end on time.'
He weighs your token and decides how heavy your life is today.
'Throw a round, finish strong, bleed pretty. Pick any two.'
A drawer shuts on a secret that stays shut.
He stamps your wrist with ink that knows where the tunnel is.
'Bell's in five. Be what they paid for.'

choices.text: Gamble your purse on a promise.
